subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Jacob deGrom and the Yankees’ Mark Teixeira and Dellin Betances were named as reserves for the All-Star Game, but Rodriguez was not, despite a solid season since returning from a one-year drug suspension.
snippet: The Mets’ Jacob deGrom and the Yankees’ Mark Teixeira and Dellin Betances were named as reserves for the All-Star Game, but Rodriguez was not, despite a solid season since returning from a one-year drug suspension.
